data.client_settings: Canary - Build Number: 20174 / PTB - Build Number: 20040
data.actual_result: The video turns off for a split second and you can see the avatar of the user, then turns back on
data.short_description: When in a video call with someone, the camera goes off for a split second while (un-)muting
data.steps_to_repro: - call your best friend! - turn on your camera - go to a different channel (so you get the little video box) - (un-)mute and observe
